name: RUSH: RUN UP SUPER HIGH
description:
Welcome to a thrilling multiplayer race to the top, testing your parkour skills against 199 players across unknown landscapes. Aim for the World's Top 10 while maneuvering through stacked, unpredictable objects. Stay focused and patient in this high-stakes game where every move matters. Our precise control system turns your instincts into in-game actions, pushing your gaming skills to the limit.




Play with your friends and track their progress in real-time. Simply choose your opponents and beat'em all!




Look for the shortest paths and overtake everyone on your way to victory. You can finish way faster than your friends.




You will never get bored among the huge variety of obstacles on your way or you can just stop and enjoy the amazing views of the world around you.



Each run in RUSH is a new chance to shatter records and grow as a player. The journey might be challenging, but the thrill of competition and victory are rewarding. RUSH isn't just a game. It's a platform to test skills and build community. Ready to prove your worth? The challenge is waiting!
